name: Infinite runner project
description:
High level concept: You play as a character who has just pulled off a heist and must run away with their ill-gotten cash. To do so you must travel in a straight line jumping, and dodging left and right to avoid obstacles, while picking up more bundles of cash or jewels along the way. The player character will always move at a constant but increasing speed, it is the players only duty to control the jumping and and such. As the player runs into obstacles they will lower the players score.

Controls:

Jump: Space Bar - Hold space to jump higher and for longer

Move Left and Right: A & D
